feature: 1. 【Auto-night Light】--- An patented light sensor triggers a soft glow to illuminate the dial when placed in low light so you can see it without touching it.
2. 【Dimmer Nightlight】--- A dimmer wheel which located at the backside enables you to control the nightlight to get your preferred level.
3. 【Super Loud】--- The alarm is the pendulum slamming on the physical bells, super loud alarm clock for trouble waking up, heavy sleeper, hard of hearing , nags you out of bed without any delay.
1. 【Auto-night Light】--- An patented light sensor triggers a soft glow to illuminate the dial when placed in low light so you can see it without touching it.
2. 【Dimmer Nightlight】--- A dimmer wheel which located at the backside enables you to control the nightlight to get your preferred level.
3. 【Super Loud】--- The alarm is the pendulum slamming on the physical bells, super loud alarm clock for trouble waking up, heavy sleeper, hard of hearing , nags you out of bed without any delay.
4. 【Five Minutes Snooze】--- Compared to traditional non-snooze bell alarm clocks which alarm can be completely shut off only, this unit can also takes you a light nap by pushing the snooze button.

5. 【User Friendly Design】--- People who are used to read Military Time can also read the outer dial to know the PM time. 3 AA batteries operated (NOT PROVIDED). Size: 5 (L) * 2 1/2(W) * 7 (H) inch. Unlimited 360 days warranty.
